properties.name: featurepilot.source.provider
properties.description: Which provider to use: local or server.

properties.name: featurepilot.source.server.url
properties.description: Base URL of the remote FeaturePilot server.

properties.name: featurepilot.source.server.auth.api-key
properties.description: API key for authenticating with the remote FeaturePilot server.

properties.name: featurepilot.source.server.project
properties.description: Project name for remote feature flag resolution.

properties.name: featurepilot.source.server.refresh
properties.description: Refresh interval in milliseconds for remote feature polling.

properties.name: featurepilot.source.server.fallback
properties.description: Fallback to default flows if remote server is not available.

properties.name: featurepilot.flags
properties.description: Key-value map of feature flags and their variants.
